Enslaved story is based on a famous Chinese novel "Journey to the West", written four centuries ago. Ninja Theory studio suffered classic story in a post-apocalyptic future: after 150 years, the world will be destroyed by war and environmental disasters, and remain alive only a few. Remain very strong and fast fighter Monkey and a young woman technician Tripp were captured on one of the ships slaveholders who are looking for survivors and transported there, where no one returns. Couple manages to escape, but Trip quickly realizes that she can return home only with the help of Monkey. She manages to deceive his companion, and put on him a special device that binds them together - if she dies, it too will be killed. So begins their journey to the west on the ruined and dangerous world.
